In this session of **MA1034Eng** the objectives are:

* Introduce the concept of eigenvalues and eigenvectors. <br/><br/>
* Compute eigenvalues and eigenvectors of matrices. <br/><br/>
* Apply the concept of eigenvalues and eigenvectors in linear transformations. <br/><br/>
